BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACT_PGR_FUN_AGN_MST SET STR_AGN_CODE=?,STR_AGN_NAME=?, STR_AGN_TYPE=?,STR_ADD=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GNUM_ISVALID=?,GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_FUN_AGN_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACT_PGR_FUN_AGN_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_FUN_AGN_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACT_PGR_FUN_AGN_MST (NUM_FUN_AGN_ID, STR_AGN_CODE, STR_AGN_NAME, STR_AGN_TYPE,STR_ADD,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACT_PGR_FUN_AGN_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_FUN_AGN_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACT_PGR_FUN_AGN_MST (NUM_FUN_AGN_ID, STR_AGN_CODE, STR_AGN_NAME, STR_AGN_TYPE,STR_ADD,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACT_PGR_FUN_AGN_MST SET GNUM_ISVALID=0,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_FUN_AGN_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
